com.soa.delegate.auth.callback

Class SSOTokenCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.delegate.auth.callback.SSOTokenCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.security.auth.callback.Callback

    public class SSOTokenCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.security.auth.callback.Callback, java.io.Serializable
    Holds a 3rd party SSO token credential between the consumer application environment and the Delegate Management Container
